definition: to take (in the widest variety of applications)
kjvTranslation: accept, bring, buy, carry away, drawn, fetch, get, infold, [idiom] many, mingle, place, receive(-ing), reserve, seize, send for, take (away, -ing, up), use, win.

translations.da: at tage (i den bredeste vifte af applikationer)
translations.el: να λάβει (στην ευρύτερη δυνατή ποικιλία εφαρμογών)
translations.es: tomar (en la más amplia variedad de aplicaciones)
translations.fr: prendre (dans la plus grande variété d'applications)
translations.it: da prendere (nella più ampia varietà di applicazioni)
translations.ja: を取るために（最も幅広い用途で）
translations.nb: å ta (i et bredt spekter av bruksområder)
translations.nl: te nemen (in de meest uiteenlopende toepassingen)
translations.pt: tomar (na mais ampla variedade de aplicações)
translations.ro: a lua (în cea mai largă varietate de aplicații)
translations.sv: att ta (i de flesta olika tillämpningar)
translations.zh: 采取（在最广泛的应用中）
